abstract: Bill Gates, Microsoft‘s chairman, spoke to hundreds of marketers and advertising agencies in Seattle on Tuesday amid rumblings about his company’s struggle to compete against Google in online advertising and about its efforts to court Yahoo for some sort of partnership.
lead_paragraph: Bill Gates, Microsoft‘s chairman, spoke to hundreds of marketers and advertising agencies in Seattle on Tuesday amid rumblings about his company’s struggle to compete against Google in online advertising and about its efforts to court Yahoo for some sort of partnership.

headline.main: Gates Discusses Software, but Talk of a Yahoo Deal Persists
